title: Grandma's Warm Hearth and Homemade Bread
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed, expressive lighting, 16:9 aspect ratio, 2D Anime style, Studio Ghibli aesthetic, wholesome, Lofi mood. A smiling elderly woman (grandmother) with grey hair tied in a bun, wearing a pink sweater and a floral apron, happily kneading fresh bread dough on a wooden board. Cozy rustic kitchen interior bathed in warm morning sunlight streaming through a large window overlooking lush greenery. The kitchen features wooden counters, potted plants on the windowsill, and a traditional brick oven hearth with glowing fire. Freshly baked bread loaves are cooling nearby. A small ginger and white cat sleeps peacefully in the oven alcove. Foreground view of a table set with a red/white checkered tablecloth, a bowl of fresh mixed berries, sliced bread, and a steaming teacup. Soft shading, highly detailed background.
